1.content:
Leviathan Behemoth Dragonflyer: A dragon who loves to bottom, 20 years old. Teaches at the Anthro academy of literature and arts as an art teacher. He was once bullied at school and would love to teach them a lesson, but wouldn't want to hurt his teaching job. He was also molested at age 5. Kinda chubby and all around a nice guy, unless he gets really ticked off. Husband of Lance. Blue body scales with a light teal belly and purple eyes.

Lance Woofie Dragonflyer: A Husky top. 21 years old. Works as a custodian for Micro Nom's. He hate's his job but because of his hubby's poor salary chooses to work there to keep the bills paid. Very athletic with a lean build. But can be a bit of a pessimist sometimes. Husband to Leviathan. Rainbow hair, Purple fur and green eyes.

Johnny Daniel Sooks: A Jaguar who likes to give oral. Age 30. Owner of Micro Nom's. Dreams of being a writer or an artist one day and attends Anthro Academy. He hates Jimmy for being in direct competition with him. He would also love to fire Lance for always missing spots, but he knows his favorite teacher is married to him and would never do anything to hurt him. Doing great at his job. Very muscular and not known to take shit from anyone. Green fur, blue eyes.

James (Jimmy) Michael Clark: A Mouse who likes receiving oral. Age 32. Owner of Big Clarks. Micro Nom's competetion. He wishes his competition would die off and he would be able to attend Anthro Academy, but is stuck as a fast food owner for now. Fat and very depressed at the moment due to losing sales to Micro Nom's.
1.title: Choose your character

info.brief_description: This is a story about a gay macro furry and his adventures in vore
info.description:
Rules:
No one sentence chapters or they will be deleted.
Scat is allowed.
If a character is eaten they are dead in a few hours no reforming.
all male oriented vore is allowed.
No samesize vore.
Males only.
Planetary vore is fine in later choices.
info.pretty_title: I'm a Big Kid now a Gay Furry Vore Story
